text: "Hot Tottie" is a song by American singer Usher. It was written by Usher, Ester Dean, Jay-Z and Polow da Don. It was produced by Don. It features rapper Jay-Z and Ester Dean in the song. It was released as the second single from Versus (2010). It was released on August 9, 2010. It samples Big Tymers' "Big Ballin'" song. == Charts == Chart (2010) Peak position UK Singles (The Official Charts Company) 104 == Release history == Country Date Format United States August 9, 2010 Rhythmic airplay August 17, 2010 urban airplay Australiahttp://www.themusicnetwork.com/music- releases/singles/2010/11/01/issue-811/usher-ft-jay-z--hot-tottie/ November 1, 2010 Contemporary Hit Radio == References == Category:2010 songs Category:Usher songs
title: Hot Tottie
